divs: Sighting Detailsoutside my backyard I saw what I thought was venus but its not visible as its on the other side of the planet now,its still there now.solid white light no pulsation or fluctuation,small movements in all directions,no discernable pattern,almost looks like 'pilot" is drunk?,not fast.planes flew overhead closer to me,hard to say but it looks like its at a similar height but many miles to the south east.Not sure if related to event but kept thinking the trees and rooftops were being illuminated but as I took focus of object effect disappeard.Just looked back and it has risen a few degrees in the sky.Checked star charts nothing was noted of anything in its position.I'm sending this now in hopes someone gets in time to see it,will continue observation
